interfaces

Interface WebCommunication

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HTTPCommunication, NamespaceManager, NodeManager, WebSocketCommunication

    public interface WebCommunication
    This interface is used to standardize different communication protocols to crud operations that are supported by the representation manager.
    Author:
    Jan-Peter.Schmidt

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int executeCreate(String name, File file)
      Performs a create operation and returns internal status code
      int executeDelete(String name)
      Performs delete operation and returns internal status code.
      core.controller.communication.ReadResponse executeRead(String name, String accept)
      Performs a read operation and returns ReadResponse containing the status and a file with rdf oder html data.
      int executeUpdate(String name, File file)
      Performs an update operation and returns internal status code.

    • Method Detail

      • executeCreate

        int executeCreate(String name,
                  File file)
        Performs a create operation and returns internal status code
        Parameters:
        name - Name of representation that should be created
        file - File that contains RDF data or SPARQL Query for representation
        Returns:
        Internal Statuscode
        0: unknown error,
        1: created, no file,
        2: created, with file

      • executeRead

        core.controller.communication.ReadResponse executeRead(String name,
                                                       String accept)
        Performs a read operation and returns ReadResponse containing the status and a file with rdf oder html data.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of virtual representation
        accept - MediaType of accepdtedRepresentation
        Returns:
        An instance of ReadResponse containing an Integer statusCode and a file with rdf or html data
        -1 object not found;
        0 unknown error;
        1 found, representation;
        2 found, variable

      • executeUpdate

        int executeUpdate(String name,
                  File file)
        Performs an update operation and returns internal status code.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of virtual representation
        file - File to store in virtual representation
        Returns:
        Internal statusCode. -1 object not found;
        0 unknown error;
        1 found, representation;
        2 found, variable

      • executeDelete

        int executeDelete(String name)
        Performs delete operation and returns internal status code.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of representation
        Returns:
        Internal statucode.
        -1 object not found;
        0 unknown error;
        1 found, representation;
        2 found, variable
